title: 95/58/EC: Commission Decision of 2 March 1995 amending Decision 94/85/EC drawing up a list of third countries from which the Member States authorize imports of fresh poultrymeat (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 2 March 1995 amending Decision 94/85/EC drawing up a list of third countries from which the Member States authorize imports of fresh poultrymeat (Text with EEA relevance) (95/58/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN  COMMUNITIES
main_body:
In the Annex to Commission Decision 94/85/EC the following lines are inserted in accordance with the alphabetic order of the ISO-code:
"" ID="1">' > ID="2">NA> ID="3">Namibia> ID="4">Ă> ID="5">ostrich meat only:"> ID="2">SI> ID="3">Slovenia> ID="4">Ă> ID="6">'">
This Decision shall apply from 1 March 1995.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 2 March 1995.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 268, 24. 9. 1991, p. 35.
(2) OJ No L 340, 31. 12. 1993, p. 39.
(3) OJ No L 44, 17. 2. 1994, p. 31.
(4) OJ No L 187, 22. 7. 1994, p. 11.
